form.name: form1

span.div: CV Distance Learning website is up and going please click link below to check out the site. If your student's teacher is not listed yet please check back. All assignments will be posted when available.

img.title: CV Logo
img.alt: Distance Learning extended remainder of 2019 - 2020 school year
img.h3: Distance Learning extended remainder of 2019 - 2020 school year

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial

p.span: Governor DeWine announced Monday April 20, 2020 that remote learning will continue for the remainder of the 19-20 school year.

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial

p.span: Please stay tuned to our website www.cvul.org and our CV Facebook page for further information regarding remote learning and end-of-year plans.

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial

p.span: Please read below for senior information, and proposed dates for graduation and prom.

div.span: As soon as we have a date we will let everyone know.

img.title: CV Logo
img.alt: GIANT LIST OF IDEAS FOR BEING HOME WITH KIDS
img.h3: GIANT LIST OF IDEAS FOR BEING HOME WITH KIDS

div.span: Learning for the Next Three Weeks:
Over the next three weeks please encourage your students to Read at least 15 minutes a day. Also encourage them to work on their math facts like multiplication tables.

div.div: District Office: 21 Mound Street, PO Box 187, Sherrodsville, OH 44675
